Kieran Porter - CV
 
 
07588181668
 
 
kieranaporter88@gmail.com
 
 
An enthusiastic, self-motivated and hardworking professional with a proven track record of over 14+ years of sales performance
 
 
within high pressure environments. Experience in leading teams to hit high targets across varying roles within IT sales. Ability to
 
 
manage personal workloads to maintain a high level of overachievement within business and personal goals. Entrepreneurial
 
 
mindset with an ability to adapt to situations and change thought process to overcome difficult tasks.
 
 
Key Skills
 
 
• 14+ Years of sales and lead generation experience across small, medium and enterprise size customers
 
 
• Extensive experience in the IT market in all verticals, including software, hardware, security and cloud
 
 Kieran Porter - CV
 
 
07588181668
 
 
kieranaporter88@gmail.com
 
 
An enthusiastic, self-motivated and hardworking professional with a proven track record of over 14+ years of sales performance
 
 
within high pressure environments. Experience in leading teams to hit high targets across varying roles within IT sales. Ability to
 
 
manage personal workloads to maintain a high level of overachievement within business and personal goals. Entrepreneurial
 
 
mindset with an ability to adapt to situations and change thought process to overcome difficult tasks.
 
 
Key Skills
 
 
• 14+ Years of sales and lead generation experience across small, medium and enterprise size customers
 
 
• Extensive experience in the IT market in all verticals, including software, hardware, security and cloud
 
 
• Natural ability to engage with customers at c-level and below and build lasting, strategic relationships with a hunter mindset
 
 
• A strong track record of hitting monthly and yearly targets as well as managing renewal and net new territories
 
 
• Extensive experience in face to face customer engagement and events
 
 
• Very creative and able to setup new campaigns, managing these and show ROI at campaign end as well as supporting my
 
 
team members with new ideas and campaigns
 
 
• Years of experience in competitive scenarios against other Vendors with a strong track record of winning the business
 
 
• Experience in implementing business solutions to improve operational efficiency and provide ROI on strategic solutions
 
 
• The ability to setup and manage my own franchise/business from system’s implementation, hiring of staff, partner and product
 
 
adoption, contract agreements, revenue management and marketing
 
 
Career
 
11/03/2019 – Present – Enterprise Sales Account Executive – Tenable
 
• Working with global 1billion+ turnover companies to help align new solutions that will reduce risk within security programs
 
and ensure compliance.
 
• Engaging with CISO’s to identify risks and gaps within IT security operations and putting together
 
business cases for non budgeted projects.
 
20/12/2017 – 28/02/2019 – Enterprise Sales Account Executive – OpenText
 
Ltd
 
 
• Working with global 1billion+ turnover companies to help align new solutions that will enable them to meet company
 
 
objectives and drive increased operational efficiency and ROI from business applications.
 
 
• Enabling clients to work towards GDPR compliance and reduce risk across the business.
 
 
01/03/2016 – 31/11/2017 – Sales Director – Redcoin Limited
 
 
• Managing a sales team, setting business objectives, sales targets and metrics, whilst also managing partner
 
 
rejuvenation, adoption and education.
 
 
• Assistance in restructuring the financial targets, commission structure and FY18 plan of the business.
 
 
• Vendor relationship management, negotiation of business terms and pipeline generation.
 
 
01/02/2015 – 31/12/2015 – Microsoft Corporate Accounts Sales Executive
 
 
• Managing a $25+ million-dollar business and supporting and managing 125 key accounts across London as well as
 
 
hunting for net new customers in London.
 
 
• Working with ISV, SI and License Partners to build strong campaigns and events to deliver value to customers and
 
 
potential new customers across the territory.
 
 
• Ensuring delivery revenue against sales quota, as well as growth against all key product workloads.
 
 
 
03/11/2012 – 31/01/2015 – Microsoft Further Education Business Manager
 
 
• Managing a $20+ million-dollar business and supporting 300 managed and 200 breadth customers.
 
 
• Running webinars and events in partnership with our partners to deliver pipeline growth.
 
 
• Assisting institutions to train staff and students, as well as knowledge transfer to my peers to enable growth across
 
 
the education sector.
 
 
Awards
 
 
FY14 - SMSG - General Manager's Team Award
 
 
FY14 - CPE - Do The Right Thing Award
 
 
FY14 - SMSP - Individual Achiever Award
 
 
FY14 - SMSP - Winning Team Award
 
 
FY14 - Team Green Jacket Award - Cloud Projects
 
 
Corporate Account Manager - Sophos - 19/04/2010 – 30/10/2012
 
Frontline Support – Research Machines

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
